title: Best Use of Authorize.net
description: Use Authorize.Netâ€™s payment solutions (API, SDK, etc.) in your project. Each winning team member will receive an L20 Gaming Headset.

title: Snap Kit Weekly Challenge
description: Use Snap Kit in your hack. One winning team will be selected from all MLH Member Events each weekend and top entries will be reviewed by Snap engineers. Each winning team member will receive a pair of Spectacles by Snapchat.

title: Best use of the Cisco Webex Teams API
description: Use the Webex Teams API or mobile SDK in your project.  One winning team will be selected from all MLH Member Events each weekend.  Each member of the winning team will receive a power bank.
button-text: Get Started with the Cisco Webex Teams API

title: Best use of Algolia API
description: Use Algolia's search API in your project. Each winning team member will receive a Casio Calculator Watch.

title: Best Domain Registered with Domain.com
description: Register a domain using Domain.com during the weekend. Each team may submit one entry per person on the team.  Each winning team member will receive a Raspberry Pi & PiHut Essential Kit.

title: Best Octocat Drawing
description: Draw a picture of the GitHub Octocat.  Tweet a picture of your drawing at @GitHubEducation with both the hackathon's hastag and #MyOctocat.  The winner at each event will receive an Octocat Statue.

title: Best use of HERE.com
description: Use HERE.com's mapping API or SDK in your project.

title: Best IoT Hack using a Qualcomm Device
description: Use a Qualcomm device, like the Dragonboard 410C, in your IoT project.  Each winning team member will receive their own DragonBoard 410C.

title: Best use of Clarifai's API
description: Use Clarifai's image or video recognition API or SDK in your project.  One winning team will be selected from all MLH Member Events each weekend.

title: Best Social Good Hack
description: Demo a project that makes the world a better place through social good. One winning team will be selected from all MLH Member Events each weekend.
